mapper.select: SELECT e.employee_id AS employeeId, e.employee_name AS employeeName, r.rank_name AS rankName, d.department_name AS departmentName, t.team_name AS teamName, DATE_FORMAT(p.reviewer_created_at, '%Y-%m-%d') AS yearMonth, g.goal_content AS performanceContent, p.performance_value AS performanceValue, sr.reviewer_score AS reviewScore FROM selfreview p JOIN goal g ON p.goal_id = g.goal_id JOIN employee e ON g.employee_id = e.employee_id LEFT JOIN rank r ON e.rank_id = r.rank_id LEFT JOIN department d ON e.department_id = d.department_id LEFT JOIN team t ON e.team_id = t.team_id LEFT JOIN selfreview sr ON sr.goal_id = g.goal_id WHERE p.selfreview_status = '승인' ORDER BY p.reviewer_created_at DESC
